item.title: Docker compose for managing personal server
item.description: For a long time, I tried to find the most comfortable way to manage a server where I host something for myself, some kind of DevOps framework. And I think I found the best way so far. Since most of the times things I want to host are useless and I often change my mind, there are several requirements for it: Easy to add/remove new components. Let’s say I created a website, and a couple of days later I added a DNS server on the same host, and then I went to Russia, so I also need to host VPN.
